question: Which FIFA Football World Cup was the venue of the event "Maracanazo"?
explanation: The 1950 FIFA World Cup was the venue of the event "Maracanazo". The 1950 World Cup, held in Brazil, saw the return of 1930 champions Uruguay, who had boycotted the previous two World Cups. Uruguay won the tournament again after defeating the host nation Brazil, in the match called "Maracanazo".
